text: @ThePubliusUSA Kushner can go fuck off. He's literally a moron doing a 3rd grade book report from the White House podium. Ignorant asshole has been "advising" the DumDum-In-Chief to let #CoronavirusPandemic run its course. Thousands of American deaths on their hands! #StayHomeSaveLives
